>it says that Shimada Kai studied Shinkeito Ryu in Edo, but everywhere
>else indicates Shingyoto Ryu- was this just a mistake, or is there
>more to it?

He's misreading the "gyo" of "Shingyoto" as "kei" (which is its alternate 
reading). This isn't an issue of alternate naming, it's an issue of 
Hillsborough not knowing how to read it properly.

-M.
